name: TimeQuake
storyline:
On a remote island, ‘The Infinity Corporation’ has been secretly developing a gigantic time machine, called the ChronoSphere. Their goal? To alter the course of human history and make themselves the de facto rulers of the world.

To stop ‘The Infinity Corporation’, coalition forces launched a military assault. During the attack, the ChronoSphere was damaged causing it to malfunction. This malfunction created a time bubble around the island which resets itself every 15 minutes. With each reset, the bubble grows. If unconstrained, it will engulf the whole planet. Eventually, the entire universe will be trapped in a time loop.

Do you want to “Protect our Past” or “Fight for a new Future”?

It’s time to decide whose side you’re on.
summary: Time is your weapon in this online PVP first-person team shooter. Opposing factions bend time to take out opponents, complete objectives and dominate the battlefield.
